name: One Step From The Light
description:
A dungeon labyrinth game made for Trijam #161! The theme was "Pressure rises"

In this game you're in a labyrinth, and your goal is to escape to the light! But be careful, you won't have much time! There'll also be some timers around the map to give you some extra time, but there'll also be bombs, so be careful to not explode!

Will you be able to find the end and escape to the light in time?

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move around

Goal:
Unlock the end and escape from the labyrinth

Work time:
Game: 7 hours (by me)
Art: 4 hours (by plutoniantoad)

Credits:
Game by me
Sprites and art by plutoniantoad (link to her Instagram)
